articles.title: Mickey Callaway, Angels pitching coach, accused of sexually inappropriate behavior - CNN
articles.description: The Los Angeles Angels suspended pitching coach Mickey Callaway on Tuesday following a report by The Athletic alleging Callaway sent inappropriate pictures and unprompted texts to at least five female reporters over a span of at least five years.
